Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] or [[/item .mmNightmareRay00]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmSpellcasting00]].

Nightmare Ray.name: Nightmare Ray
Nightmare Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Large Giant, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person} (level 2 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.name: Invisibility
7zCgLqwWT0prZxhy.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Charm Person.name: Charm Person
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can’t see through it, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn’t being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it’s wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description:
Each creature of your choice in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

Creatures that don’t sleep, such as elves, or that have Immunity to the Exhaustion condition automatically succeed on saves against this spell.

Sleeping.name: Sleeping
Sleeping.description: The target has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and two [[/item Tentacle]] attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=tKShuY4vDM7tn9aC]].

Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/damage 1d10 average]] and doesn’t return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target.

Success: The Poisoned condition ends.

save.condition: Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it must make a Constitution Saving Throw or have its Hit Point maximum reduced by [[/damage 1d10 average]] until the Poisoned condition ends.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two tentacles.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmBejeweledBaton]] attacks.

Majestic Song.name: Majestic Song
Majestic Song.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition (performer’s choice) until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition (performer’s choice) until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProjectIma]{Project Image}

Warding Charm.name: Warding Charm
Warding Charm.description:
Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTaurVqDcUSvviyB]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack roll misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: A creature hits the attacking creature with an attack roll.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: If the attack roll misses the attacking creature's target, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

Sensory Effect. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

Fire Play. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Clean or Soil. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

Minor Sensation. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

Magic Mark. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

Minor Creation. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can’t deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Project Image.name: Project Image
Project Image.description:
You create an illusory copy of yourself that lasts for the duration. The copy can appear at any location within range that you have seen before, regardless of intervening obstacles. The illusion looks and sounds like you, but it is intangible. If the illusion takes any damage, it disappears, and the spell ends.

You can see through the illusion’s eyes and hear through its ears as if you were in its space. As a Magic action, you can move it up to 60 feet and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It mimics your mannerisms perfectly.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be illusory, since things can pass through it. A creature that takes the Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and any noise it makes sounds hollow to the creature.

Performer Maestro.description:

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]{Tasha’s Hideous Laughter} (level 3 version)

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Tasha's Hideous Laughter.description:
One creature of your choice that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level about 1.

Uncontrollable Laughter.name: Uncontrollable Laughter
Uncontrollable Laughter.description:
has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

While Poisoned, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

+3 AC.name: +3 AC

Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Fear Aura.name: Fear Aura
Fear Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emanates an aura in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]]-foot Emanation while it doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=oT8238p9jXwVy76c]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s aura for 24 hours.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Bite.name: Bite

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it must make the following saving throw.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fM7YmQ4hBtRXJkMe]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points and takes [[/damage average activity=aa2GUeTEVLOdmfrB]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

Hellfire Spellcasting.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
Hellfire Spellcasting.description: The pit fiend casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).. It can replace one Fireball with @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster} (level 7 version) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Hold Monster.name: Hold Monster
Hold Monster.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 5.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Wall of Fire.name: Wall of Fire
Wall of Fire.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Faerie Dust.name: Faerie Dust
Faerie Dust.description: Melee or Ranged Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition (attacking creature's choice) until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition (attacking creature's choice) until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description:
Each creature of your choice in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

Creatures that don’t sleep, such as elves, or that have Immunity to the Exhaustion condition automatically succeed on saves against this spell.

Sleeping.name: Sleeping
Sleeping.description: The target has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmFaerieDust0000]] attacks.

Faerie Dust.description: Melee or Ranged Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition (attacking creature's choice) until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition (attacking creature's choice) until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}

Burst of Wonder.name: Burst of Wonder
Burst of Wonder.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{Polymorph}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]{Tasha's Hideous Laughter}, requiring no Material components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.description:
You attempt to transform a creature that you can see within range into a Beast. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or shape-shift into a Beast form for the duration. That form can be any Beast you choose that has a Challenge Rating equal to or less than the target’s (or the target’s level if it doesn’t have a Challenge Rating). The target’s game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen Beast, but the target retains its alignment, personality, creature type, Hit Points, and Hit Point Dice. See appendix B for a sample of Beast stat blocks.

The target gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the Beast form. The spell ends early on the target if it has no Temporary Hit Points left.

The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form, and it can’t speak or cast spells.

The target’s gear melds into the new form. The creature can’t use or otherwise benefit from any of that equipment.

Entangle.name: Entangle
Entangle.description:
Grasping plants sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into &Reference[difficultterrain]. They disappear when the spell ends.

Each creature (other than you) in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Tasha's Hideous Laughter.description:
One creature of your choice that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level about 1.

Uncontrollable Laughter.name: Uncontrollable Laughter
Uncontrollable Laughter.description:
has the &Reference[prone apply=false] and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] conditions for the duration. During that time, it laughs uncontrollably if it’s capable of laughter, and it can’t end the Prone condition on itself.

At the end of each of its turns and each time it takes damage, it makes another [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw. The target has Advantage on the save if the save is triggered by damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Druidcraft.description:

Invisibility.description:

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can’t deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Divine Awareness.name: Divine Awareness
Divine Awareness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

Exalted Restoration.name: Exalted Restoration
Exalted Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item Radiant Sword]] attacks or uses [[/item Holy Burst]] twice.

Holy Burst.name: Holy Burst
Holy Burst.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommune000]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRaiseDead0]{Raise Dead}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Commune.name: Commune
Commune.description:
You contact a deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with yes or no. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. You receive a correct answer for each question.

Divine beings aren’t necessarily omniscient, so you might receive “unclear” as an answer if a question pertains to information that lies beyond the deity’s knowledge. In a case where a one-word answer could be misleading or contrary to the deity’s interests, the DM might offer a short phrase as an answer instead.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

Control Weather.name: 操控天气
Control Weather.description:
你在法术持续时间内操控距你 5 英里内的天气。你在施法时必须位于户外，并且若你回到室内，法术会提前终止。

你施展此法术时，可以改变现有的天气状况（由DM决定）。你可以改变降水、气温和风势。新状况需要 1d4 × 10 分钟才能起效。一旦新状况起效，你便能再次改变天气状况。法术结束时，天气状况会逐渐回归正常。

改变天气状况时，你可以从下述表格查明与目前状况对应的等级，再选择同一表格中高一级或低一级的状况作为其改变结果。改变风势时，你还可以同时改变其风向。

降水
阶段状况
1晴
2薄云
3多云或有雾
4雨、雹或雪
5倾盆大雨、猛烈冰雹或漫天暴雪
气温
阶段状况
1酷热
2炎热
3温暖
4凉爽
5寒冷
6极寒
风势
阶段状况
1无风
2和风
3强风
4大风
5暴风

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.description:
With a touch, you revive a dead creature if it has been dead no longer than 10 days and it wasn’t Undead when it died.

The creature returns to life with 1 Hit Point. This spell also neutralizes any poisons that affected the creature at the time of death.

This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesn’t restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survival—its head, for instance—the spell automatically fails.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 1)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 2)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 4)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 3)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell’s level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner’s Attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

Hold Breath.name: Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmObjectSlam0000]] attack and uses [[/item .mmTelekineticThr]].

Object Slam.name: Object Slam
Object Slam.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Telekinetic Thrust.name: Telekinetic Thrust
Telekinetic Thrust.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] [[lookup @range.units activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]]. straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Vanish.name: Vanish
Vanish.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition or ends that condition on itself.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The attacking creature and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until their Concentration ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the wisp makes an attack roll or uses the Consume Life bonus action.

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .hRwqUlEyM9TjOmHy]] or [[/item .mmRadiantFlame00]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell’s level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn’t being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
You create a floating, spectral force that resembles a weapon of your choice and lasts for the duration. The force appears within range in a space of your choice, and you can immediately make one melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of the force. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.

Priest Acolyte.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, , @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}

Healing Word.description:

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
Sanctuary.description: You ward a creature within range. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack roll or a damaging spell must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc format=long]] or either choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesn’t protect the warded creature from areas of effect. The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or deals damage.

Warded.name: Warded
Warded.description:
Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack roll or a damaging spell must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis format=long]] or either choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.

The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or deals damage.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn’t being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRavage00000000]] attacks.

Ravage.name: Ravage
Ravage.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=Gi7NHst31Yf0KVM9]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=Gi7NHst31Yf0KVM9]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage 2d8 slashing average]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Screech.name: Screech
Screech.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attacks.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet.

Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

Failure by 5 or More: The Poisoned target also has the Unconscious condition until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it awake.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour.

Poisoned (Failure 5+).name: Poisoned (Failure 5+)
Poisoned (Failure 5+).description:
The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour.

The Poisoned target also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it awake.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has Disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Save Disadvantage: Intelligence.name: Save Disadvantage: Intelligence
Save Disadvantage: Intelligence.description: The target has Disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws until the end of the user's next turn.

Psychic Crush.name: Psychic Crush
Psychic Crush.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nq3NdZPLWJsTChUc]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=nq3NdZPLWJsTChUc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=nq3NdZPLWJsTChUc]] [[lookup @range.units activity=nq3NdZPLWJsTChUc]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Mind Corrosion.name: Mind Corrosion
Mind Corrosion.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect created by a creature. Response: The triggering creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Damage.name: Damage
Damage.condition: fails a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect created by a creature.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmTailStinger000]] attack.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to three creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the Grappled conditions end. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has Total Cover against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].
