Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
Spellcasting. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} (the hand is Invisible), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

2/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike}

Psionic Defense.name: Psionic Defense
Psionic Defense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Feather Fall.name: Feather Fall
Feather Fall.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If a creature lands before the spell ends, the creature takes no damage from the fall, and the spell ends for that creature.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Mind Spike.name: Mind Spike
Mind Spike.description:
You drive a spike of psionic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, taking 3d8 Psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, you also always know the target’s location until the spell ends, but only while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. While you have this knowledge, the target can’t become hidden from you, and if it has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition, it gains no benefit from that condition against you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 2.

Spiked.name: Spiked
Spiked.description: You always know the target’s location until the spell ends, but only while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. While you have this knowledge, the target can’t become hidden from you, and if it has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition, it gains no benefit from that condition against you.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

32LONl1rUCtttKkg.name: Invisibility
32LONl1rUCtttKkg.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts to resemble a bat (Speed 10 ft., Fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., Climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., Swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Scare.name: Scare
Scare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition.

Questing Knight.name: Questing Knight
Questing Knight.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}

Knights

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G5uYpVQgKpPIkFQY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Questing Knight

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.eXRlMJe4EnfGxGmA caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Aura of Bravery.name: Aura of Bravery
Aura of Bravery.description: Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Charmed & Frightened.name: Charmed & Frightened
Charmed & Frightened.description: Targets have immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .ogiSGKeLqpw2g1ek]] or [[/item .xqMyOHm4l8Kqx6K6]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPhantomSte]{Phantom Steed}

Daylight.name: Daylight
Daylight.description:
For the duration, sunlight spreads from a point within range and fills a 60-foot-radius Sphere. The sunlight’s area is Bright Light and sheds Dim Light for an additional 60 feet.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn’t being worn or carried, causing the sunlight to fill a 60-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the sunlight.

If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of Darkness created by a spell of level 3 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.description:
You touch a creature and magically remove one of the following effects from it:

  • 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level
  • The &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Petrified] condition
  • A curse, including the target’s Attunement to a cursed magic item
  • Any reduction to one of the target’s ability scores
  • Any reduction to the target’s Hit Point maximum

Phantom Steed.name: Phantom Steed
Phantom Steed.description:
A Large, quasi-real, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsumPhantomSte]{horselike creature} appears on the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice within range. You decide the creature’s appearance, and it is equipped with a saddle, bit, and bridle. Any of the equipment created by the spell vanishes in a puff of smoke if it is carried more than 10 feet away from the steed.

For the duration, you or a creature you choose can ride the steed. The steed uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]{Riding Horse} stat block (see appendix B), except it has a Speed of 100 feet and can travel 13 miles in an hour. When the spell ends, the steed gradually fades, giving the rider 1 minute to dismount. The spell ends early if the steed takes any damage.

Greater Magic Resistance.name: Greater Magic Resistance
Greater Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and the attack rolls of spells automatically miss it. Without the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s permission, no spell can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts, creature type, or alignment.

Fiendish Restoration.name: Fiendish Restoration
Fiendish Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly and revives with all its Hit Points in Gehenna.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmCursedTouch000]] attacks.

Cursed Touch.name: Cursed Touch
Cursed Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

Baleful Command.name: Baleful Command
Baleful Command.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Frightened & Incapacitated.name: Frightened & Incapacitated
Frightened & Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the user's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻影
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用一个研究动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其它声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件大小不得大于一个边长 5 尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can’t deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Agile.name: Agile
Agile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[opportunityattacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it moves out of an enemy’s reach.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

Red Dragon Wyrmling.name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
Red Dragon Wyrmling.description:
Red Dragons

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Rx08X1mW6m5uYldI caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Red Slaad.name: 史拉红蟾
Red Slaad.description:
Slaadi

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.AXXqca9xNbd6xnJ6 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Red Slaad

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.0xVNRpqlT9RMxLj0 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item Injecting Claw]] attacks.

Injecting Claw.name: Injecting Claw
Injecting Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]].

Failure: The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg.

Over [[/r 2d4*10#Days egg gestates]]{2d4 × 10} days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{Slaad Tadpole}, which chews out of the host and kills it.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Remorhaz.name: Remorhaz
Remorhaz.description:
Remorhazes

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.uP3cah0fyIoh75nV caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Remorhaz

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.jrzeumln8G614SWk caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Heat Aura.name: Heat Aura
Heat Aura.description: At the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turns, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to two creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Revenant.name: 还魂鬼
Revenant.description:
Revenants

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.MIgxduVUrgHmADPd caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Revenant

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.SxGjvNgZB5wXtNs9 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the revenant takes Fire or Radiant damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of its next turn. Its body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Undead Restoration.name: Undead Restoration
Undead Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it revives 24 hours later in a different body unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good} is cast on its corpse. If it revives, it animates a Humanoid corpse elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmVengefulGlare0]] and makes two [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] attacks.

Vengeful Glare.name: Vengeful Glare
Vengeful Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], it succeeds automatically. If the Frightened target is cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (see [[/item .LuIttybjU4f7tGCs]]), the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration.

Frightened & Paralyzed.name: Frightened & Paralyzed
Frightened & Paralyzed.description: If the attacking creature curses the Frightened target, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Vow of Revenge.name: Vow of Revenge
Vow of Revenge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance to and direction of the cursed target, even if it is on a different plane of existence. The curse ends on the target if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses this Bonus Action on a different creature.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended average]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=iBenqFiBu40bUxkH]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage 2d8 average type=piercing]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition if the attacking creature used its moving attack feature.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmBeak0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a [[/item .mmTalons00000000]] attack.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xdrDC5kFs6sCOFiE]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from both talons, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xdrDC5kFs6sCOFiE]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from both talons, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Swoop.name: Swoop
Swoop.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a creature Grappled, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and drops that creature.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Tentacle]] attacks, uses [[/item Reel]], and makes two [[/item Bite]] attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six tentacles, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

The tentacle can be damaged, freeing a creature it has Grappled when destroyed (AC 20, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Damaging the tentacle deals no damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and a destroyed tentacle regrows at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description:
Escape Tests (see origin item for DC)

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature Grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

Iron Scent.name: Iron Scent
Iron Scent.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and uses [[/item .mmAntennae000000]] twice.

Antennae.name: Antennae
Antennae.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object.

Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.name: Damaged: -1 AC/Attack
Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.description: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Destroy Metal.name: Destroy Metal
Destroy Metal.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]. The touch destroys a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] of the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]].

Reflexive Antennae.name: Reflexive Antennae
Reflexive Antennae.description: Trigger: An attack roll hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmAntennae000000]].

Running Leap.name: 助跑起跳
Running Leap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Nimble Escape.name: Nimble Escape
Nimble Escape.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

Blood Frenzy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its Hit Points.

Limited Amphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
Limited Amphibiousness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

Shark Telepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
Shark Telepathy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .ZygNjteqFNf4JhAR]] attacks.

Fiendish Blood.name: Fiendish Blood
Fiendish Blood.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Piercing or Slashing damage.

Response—Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9JNSVEpH1x9MUvsZ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=9JNSVEpH1x9MUvsZ]] of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=9JNSVEpH1x9MUvsZ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and [[lookup @duration.special activity=9JNSVEpH1x9MUvsZ]]. While cursed, the target can’t benefit from the Invisible condition, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and all Fiends within 120 feet of the target can sense its location regardless of interposing obstacles.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: The sahuagin takes Piercing or Slashing damage

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: The target is &Reference[cursed apply=false] until it finishes a Short or Long Rest. While cursed, the target can’t benefit from the Invisible condition, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and all Fiends within 120 feet of the target can sense its location regardless of interposing obstacles.

Spectral Jaws.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{Hold Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

Fiendish Aid.name: Fiendish Aid
Fiendish Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Hold Person.name: Hold Person
Hold Person.description:
Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Humanoid for each spell slot level above 2.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] damage, and the target starts burning, taking [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]] damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that effect can be applied multiple times, the effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target item's sheet each time the target gains a level of exhaustion after the initial level is applied.

Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
Exhaustion.description: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Blazing Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. During this movement, fire fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. When the Emanation enters a creature’s space, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. A creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]].

Fey Melody.name: Fey Melody
Fey Melody.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a charming or frightening song.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target is subjected to the song’s effect:

Charming. The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=mOFKBLSi65tp5u3i]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=mOFKBLSi65tp5u3i]]. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place. The effect ends on the target if it takes any damage.

Frightening. [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]]. If the target ends its turn out of line of sight from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the condition ends on it.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Fearsome Claw.name: Fearsome Claw

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Frightened, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Frightened & Paralyzed.name: Frightened & Paralyzed
Frightened & Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn. While Frightened, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Shortsword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], plus plus 10 (3d6) Piercing damage if the attack was made with Advantage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], plus 10 (3d6) Piercing damage if the attack was made with Advantage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .lPlB7NmujNipH61R]] or [[/item .5hkcwWhPWB1jJtji]] in any combination.

Aim.name: Aim
Aim.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn.

Uncanny Dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=NzfYZzkrG4qJ13to]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Coven Magic.name: Coven Magic
Coven Magic.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell’s normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description:
You receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. The DM chooses the omen from the Omens table.

OmenFor Results That Will Be …
WealGood
WoeBad
Weal and woeGood and bad
IndifferenceNeither good nor bad

The spell doesn’t account for circumstances, such as other spells, that might change the results.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar’s eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can’t attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can’t have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell’s casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell’s name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

Locate Object.name: Locate Object
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object’s location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can’t locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Unseen Servant.name: Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.description:
This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can’t attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

Vile Appearance.name: Vile Appearance
Vile Appearance.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]], any [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s true form.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrific Appearance for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Death Glare.name: Death Glare
Death Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Illusory Appearance.name: Illusory Appearance
Illusory Appearance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]). The spell’s duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Bubble Dash.name: Bubble Dash
Bubble Dash.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Sunlight Weakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
Sunlight Weakness.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

Draining Swipe.name: Draining Swipe
Draining Swipe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) to modify the target's Strength Score. When the target roll's their d4 to determine the loss, you can apply the respective AE to the target's sheet.

attack.chatFlavor: On Hit: Target's STR score decreases

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Light Sensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
Light Sensitivity.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Shadow Breath.name: 幽影吐息
Shadow Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies, and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from its corpse. The shadow is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control and shares the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Initiative count but acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

Veil of Shadow.name: Veil of Shadow
Veil of Shadow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shadow Stealth, and [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Living Shadow.name: 活体幽影
Living Shadow.description:
While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Acid Resistance.name: Acid Resistance
Acid Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Bludgeoning Resistance.name: Bludgeoning Resistance
Bludgeoning Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Cold Resistance.name: Cold Resistance
Cold Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Fire Resistance.name: Fire Resistance
Fire Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Lightning Resistance.name: Lightning Resistance
Lightning Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Necrotic Resistance.name: Necrotic Resistance
Necrotic Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Piercing Resistance.name: Piercing Resistance
Piercing Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Poison Resistance.name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Slashing Resistance.name: Slashing Resistance
Slashing Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Thunder Resistance.name: Thunder Resistance
Thunder Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Lightning Absorption.name: Lightning Absorption
Lightning Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmChargedTendril]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmEngulf00000000]].

Charged Tendril.name: Charged Tendril
Charged Tendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]] within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and it takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature Grappled by this action at a time.

Grappled, Blinded & Restrained.name: Grappled, Blinded & Restrained
Grappled, Blinded & Restrained.description: Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and it takes [[/damage average 3d6 type=lightning]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

Bound.name: Bound
Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is magically bound to an amulet. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet’s wearer can telepathically call the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to travel to it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 60 feet of the amulet’s wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Spell Storing.name: Spell Storing
Spell Storing.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster’s spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Fist]] attacks.

Protection.name: Protection
Protection.description:
Trigger: An attack roll hits the wearer of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

utility.condition: An attack roll hits the wearer of the guardian's amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the guardian

Protected.name: Protected
Protected.description: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the bestower's next turn.

Cold Breath.name: Cold Breath
Cold Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Paralyzing Breath.name: Paralyzing Breath
Paralyzing Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Skeleton.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]{Shortbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}

Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
