Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]])). While Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=falsse] condition and can’t be targeted by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tail.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC). While Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=falsse] condition.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Fiendish Restoration.name: Fiendish Restoration
Fiendish Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly and revives with all its Hit Points in Gehenna.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmHypnoticGaze00]] and makes two [[/item .mmMercurialWhip0]] attacks.

Mercurial Whip.name: Mercurial Whip
Mercurial Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see that isn’t in the air.

attack.chatFlavor: On Hit: Can teleport to unoccupied space, 10 ft. away.

Hypnotic Gaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
Hypnotic Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
Spellcasting. The ultroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}

Fiendish Guile.name: Fiendish Guile
Fiendish Guile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion}, requiring no Material components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell’s level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, “Fetch the key to the cult’s treasure vault, and give the key to me.” Or you could say, “Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don’t return.”

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Alter Self.name: Alter Self
Alter Self.description:
You alter your physical form. Choose one of the following options. Its effects last for the duration, during which you can take a Magic action to replace the option you chose with a different one.

Aquatic Adaptation. You sprout gills and grow webs between your fingers. You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

The Active Effect provided by the Aquatic Adaptation activity upgrades the character's Swim Speed to a value of "1" to indicate equivalence to (walk) Speed.

Change Appearance. You alter your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another species, though none of your statistics change. You can’t appear as a creature of a different size, and your basic shape stays the same; if you’re bipedal, you can’t use this spell to become quadrupedal, for instance. For the duration, you can take a Magic action to change your appearance in this way again.

Natural Weapons. You grow claws (Slashing), fangs (Piercing), horns (Piercing), or hooves (Bludgeoning). When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Aquatic Adaptation.name: Aquatic Adaptation
Aquatic Adaptation.description: You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Natural Weapon.name: Natural Weapon
Natural Weapon.description: When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.description:
You create an Invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees). The intangible, invulnerable sensor remains in place for the duration.

When you cast the spell, choose seeing or hearing. You can use the chosen sense through the sensor as if you were in its space. As a Bonus Action, you can switch between seeing and hearing.

A creature that sees the sensor (such as a creature benefiting from See Invisibility or &Reference[truesight]) sees a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as “200 feet straight downward” or “300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle.”

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Wall of Fire.name: Wall of Fire
Wall of Fire.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks

OllBlUMXahoLf3DA.name: Confusing Gaze
OllBlUMXahoLf3DA.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Unicorn.name: Unicorn
Unicorn.description:
Unicorn

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.4EtOTIaHnhnS9jA5 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Unicorn Lairs

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.sTeJ3Fyus2oyLaRk caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Hooves]] attack and one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPasswithou]{Pass without Trace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWordofReca]{Word of Recall}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Calm Emotions.name: Calm Emotions
Calm Emotions.description:
Each Humanoid in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects (choose for each creature):

  • The creature has Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions until the spell ends. If the creature was already Charmed or Frightened, those conditions are suppressed for the duration.
  • The creature becomes Indifferent about creatures of your choice that it’s Hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target takes damage or witnesses its allies taking damage. When the spell ends, the creature’s attitude returns to normal.

Calmed.name: Calmed
Calmed.description: The creature has Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions until the spell ends. If the creature was already Charmed or Frightened, those conditions are suppressed for the duration.

Indifference.name: Indifference
Indifference.description: The creature becomes Indifferent about creatures of your choice that it’s Hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target takes damage or witnesses its allies taking damage. When the spell ends, the creature’s attitude returns to normal.

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Entangle.name: Entangle
Entangle.description:
Grasping plants sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into &Reference[difficultterrain]. They disappear when the spell ends.

Each creature (other than you) in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Pass without Trace.name: Pass without Trace
Pass without Trace.description: You radiate a concealing aura in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Concealed.name: Concealed
Concealed.description: While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Word of Recall.name: Word of Recall
Word of Recall.description:
You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect.

You must designate a location, such as a temple, as a sanctuary by casting this spell there.

Charging Horn.name: Charging Horn
Charging Horn.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

Shimmering Shield.name: Shimmering Shield
Shimmering Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Shielded.name: Shielded
Shielded.description: The target's AC increases by 2 until the end of the bestower's next turn.

Unicorn's Blessing.name: Unicorn's Blessing
Unicorn's Blessing.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Vampire.name: 吸血鬼
Vampire.description:
Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.1pHv6S4uhRp75CB4 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire Lairs

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DtJNmKUcITLeOCt0 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Misty Escape.name: Misty Escape
Misty Escape.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can’t use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can’t return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]]{Grave Strike} attacks and uses [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}.

Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).name: Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only)
Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two hands.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from one of two hands.

Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] feet [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmVampireSpawn00]{Vampire Spawn} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}, the damage of which doesn’t end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charm Person.name: Charm Person
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t in sunlight or running water, it shape-shifts into a Tiny @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmBat00000000000]{bat} (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or it returns to its vampire form. Anything it is wearing transforms with it.

While in bat form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t speak. Its game statistics, other than its size and Speed, are unchanged.

While in mist form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless and can enter an enemy’s space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can’t pass through liquid. It has Resistance to all damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

Beguile.name: Beguile
Beguile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn’t move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Deathless Strike.name: Deathless Strike
Deathless Strike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]]{Grave Strike} attack.

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: Disadv. Attacks & Checks
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Vampire Familiar.name: 血仆
Vampire Familiar.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers (10)}

Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire Familiar

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.iWbAQD1GN6bn7JeU caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampiric Connection.name: Vampiric Connection
Vampiric Connection.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s senses.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmUmbralDagger00]] attacks.

Umbral Dagger.name: Umbral Dagger
Umbral Dagger.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While the target has the Poisoned condition, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Deathless Agility.name: Deathless Agility
Deathless Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

Vampire Nightbringer.name: 吸血夜魇
Vampire Nightbringer.description:
Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire Nightbringer

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmShadowStrike00]] attack.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Vampire Spawn.name: 吸血鬼衍体
Vampire Spawn.description:
Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire Spawn

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmBite0000000000]].

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two claws.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from one of two claws.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7mBlINHfcabm0DAr]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=7mBlINHfcabm0DAr]] feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Deathless Agility.name: Deathless Agility
Deathless Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: Disadv. Attacks & Checks
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Vampire Umbral Lord.name: 吸血鬼暗影尊主
Vampire Umbral Lord.description:
Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Vampire Umbral Lord

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Shadow Escape.name: 幽影遁行
Shadow Escape.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, it teleports into its resting place unless it is in running water or sunlight. If it can’t teleport, it is destroyed. Once inside its resting place, it has the &Reference[Paralyzed] condition for 1 hour, after which it regains 1 Hit Point.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The creature has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for 1 hour, after which it regains 1 Hit Point.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]] or [[/item .mmSickeningRay00]] in any combination.

Sickening Ray.name: Sickening Ray
Sickening Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Hunger of Hadar.name: Hunger of Hadar
Hunger of Hadar.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar} (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

NhHw43UmTDY3KiJ3.name: Hunger of Hadar
NhHw43UmTDY3KiJ3.description:
You open a gateway to the Far Realm, a region infested with unspeakable horrors. A 20-foot-radius Sphere of &Reference[Darkness] appears, centered on a point with range and lasting for the duration. The Sphere is &Reference[DifficultTerrain], and it is filled with strange whispers and slurping noises, which can be heard up to 30 feet away. No light, magical or otherwise, can illuminate the area, and creatures fully within it have the &Reference[Blinded] condition.

Any creature that starts its turn in the area takes 2d6 Cold damage. Any creature that ends its turn there must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 Acid damage from otherworldly tentacles.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Cold or Acid damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Sanguine Drain.name: Sanguine Drain
Sanguine Drain.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Beguile.name: Beguile
Beguile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn’t move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Umbral Strike.name: Umbral Strike
Umbral Strike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]] or [[/item .mmSickeningRay00]] attack.

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: Disadv. Attacks & Checks
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Entangling Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]).

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
Grasping plants sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into &Reference[difficultterrain]. They disappear when the spell ends.

Each creature (other than you) in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

豁免失败:受到 [[/damage average]] 点伤害, 且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直到 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一个回合开始。 中毒期间，受影响生物无法恢复生命值。

Poisoned.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直到紫腐菌尸聚怪的下一个回合开始。 中毒期间，受影响生物无法恢复生命值。

Absorb Body.name: 吞吃躯体
Absorb Body.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and becomes grafted to its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target grafted at a time.

While grafted, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and Disadvantage on Constitution saving throws. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the grafted target moves with it. If [[lookup @activation.condition activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]], its body is destroyed, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]] Hit Points.

The grafted target or a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]. On a successful check, the target is no longer grafted and moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

heal.condition: 若目标在被嫁接期间死亡

The grafted target or a creature within 5 feet of the grafter can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]] (see source item for DC). On a successful check, the target is no longer grafted and moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the grafter.

Paralyzed.description: The target has the Paralyzed condition until the start of the user's next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage.

Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or a Medium spider or back into its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Toxic Escape.name: 毒性逃脱
Toxic Escape.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 被一次攻击检定命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 令此次攻击对其造成的伤害减半（向下取整），并传送至 [[lookup @range.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] 尺内一处其可见的未占据空间。

体质豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]], [[lookup @name lowercase]] 目标空间 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] 尺内的每名生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，持续至其下个回合结束。中毒期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: The attacking creature is hit by an attack roll.

Poisoned and Incapacitated.name: 中毒并失能
Poisoned and Incapacitated.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，持续至其下个回合结束。中毒期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it’s wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Web.name: 蛛网
Web.description:
You conjure a mass of sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube there for the duration. The webs are &Reference[difficultterrain], and the area within them is &Reference[lightlyobscured].

If the webs aren’t anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn. Webs layered over a flat surface have a depth of 5 feet.

The first time a creature enters the webs on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained] condition while in the webs or until it breaks free.

A creature Restrained by the webs can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer Restrained.

The webs are flammable. Any 5-foot Cube of webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing [[/damage 2d4 type=fire]] damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

Dominate Person.name: 支配人类
Dominate Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as “Attack that creature,” “Move over there,” or “Fetch that object.” The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn’t receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 6 (up to 10 minutes), 7 (up to 1 hour), or 8+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]], 位于 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺长，[[lookup @target.template.width activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺宽的线状范围内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Sleep Breath.name: 睡眠吐息
Sleep Breath.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]， [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物

首次失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束，此时其需要重复此豁免。

再次失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态 [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] 分钟。该效应也会在其受到伤害或是被 5 尺内的一个生物用一个动作摇醒时提前结束。

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，直至下一回合结束，此时你重复豁免。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态，持续时间（请查看源条目以获取持续时间的长度）。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。目标陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），且目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

成功：仅受半伤。

Grappled and Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled and Restrained.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 14），且你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Poison Spray.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下个回合结束。中毒期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

成功：仅半伤。

Poisoned & Blinded.name: 中毒并目盲
Poisoned & Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至憎恶蛇人的下个回合结束。中毒期间，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).name: 施法(仅蛇人形态)
Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{化兽为友}（仅限蛇）

每项3/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{暗示术}

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 变形为一条大型的蛇，或变回其真实形态。如果它死亡，则会保持在当前的形态不变。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的游戏数据除了注明的那些部分外都相同。它穿戴或携带的一切装备都不会随之变化。

Animal Friendship.name: 化兽为友
Animal Friendship.description:
在施法距离内指定一只你能看见的野兽。该野兽必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，法术将提前终止。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多选择一个野兽作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 目标在法术持续时间内被你 &Reference[charmed apply=false]。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，则法术终止。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不明显涉及伤害目标及其盟友的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内或直到你或你的盟友对其造成伤害前陷入魅惑。被魅惑的目标会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不明显涉及伤害目标及其盟友的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内或直到你或你的盟友对其造成伤害前陷入魅惑。被魅惑的目标会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。

Yuan-ti Malison (Type 1).description:

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定中具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 或 [[/item .mmPoisonRay00000]]{毒素射线} 发动共计两次攻击，并使用施法施展 [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.AKHk1UYi7K8g8ct4]]（若条件允许）。

Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).name: 施法(仅蛇人形态)
Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{化兽为友}（仅限蛇）

每项2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{暗示术}

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为一条中型的蛇，或变回其真实形态。如果它死亡，则会保持在当前的形态不变。[[lookup @name lowercase]]的游戏数据除了注明的那些部分外都相同。它穿戴或携带的一切装备都不会随之变化。

Animal Friendship.name: 化兽为友
Animal Friendship.description:
在施法距离内指定一只你能看见的野兽。该野兽必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，法术将提前终止。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多选择一个野兽作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 目标在法术持续时间内被你 &Reference[charmed apply=false]。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，则法术终止。

Constrict.name: 绞缠
Constrict.description:
力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]]，单一 [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] 生物 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的 [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] 尺。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。目标陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），且目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

Grappled and Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled and Restrained.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 13），且你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时, 它必须进行一次 DC 为 5＋所受伤害值的体质豁免。 豁免成功时, 则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 生命值降至 1。
